goalSetting.title: Cwangcisa Igunya Lakho Lokuqala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Yonke indlela ifuna indawo yokufika. Yintoni igunya lakho lokuqala elikhulu lezimali?

goals.holiday: Gcina ukuze uhambe ngeHolidi yakho Yokuphupha

goalSet.title: Igunya Licwangcisiwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kulungile! Ucwangcisile igunya lakho le-{{amount}} le-{{goalTitle}}. Masiqale ukufunda nge-interest ephindaphindiweyo!

simulate.title: Zama
simulate.subtitle: Jonga ukuba imali yakho ingakhula/kuncipha njani ngokuhamba kwexesha
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Ingozi enkulu, amathuba okufumana imali eninzi
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Intlawulo incinci kakhulu ukuhlawula imali okanye ixesha liphelile sele linemali esele:
simulate.add200Desc: Hlawula R200 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukunciphisa i-interest neenyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Hlawula R500 ngaphezulu ngenyanga ukuhlawula ngokukhawuleza.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Yandisa intlawulo yakho ukuya kwi-R100 elandelayo.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenza intlawulo efana nenye ngenyanga ngonyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Imali yakho etshaliweyo ingakhula ngaphezu kwemali oyifakileyo nge-interest ephindaphindiweyo!
simulate.timeInsight: Nge-{{years}} iminyaka, unika i-interest ephindaphindiweyo ixesha elaneleyo lokusebenza.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenzi omhle! Ukungenisa R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni eya kwiinjongo zakho.
simulate.debtInsight: Ukwandisa intlawulo yakho ngemali encinci kunokunciphisa iinyanga zokuhlawula kwaye unciphise i-interest.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Ukugcina imali: i-interest yonyaka ithi ikhule njengoko imali ikhula (ukuphindaphindwa kwe-interest).
simulate.debtTableHint: Imali ekufuneka uyihlawule: i-interest yonyaka ithi inciphise njengoko imali ekhokelwayo inciphisa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Oku kukulinganisela okulula ngenjongo yokufundisa. Iziphumo zokwenene zingahluka kakhulu ngenxa yokutshintsha kwemakethe, iindleko, nezinye izinto. Ukusebenza kwangaphambili akuthembisi ukusebenza kwesikhatshana.
simulate.chartError: Itshathi ayikwazanga ukubonisa. Oku kuthi kwenzeke xa i-react-native-svg ingasebenzi. Ungasebenzisa isilinganiselo ngaphandle kwetshathi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Iingcebiso zokulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, emva koko cima & yakha kwakhona. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, emva koko yakha kwakhona.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Le {{scenarioName}} imeko ilinganisa ukubuyiselwa kwe-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka ophindaphindiweyo ngenyanga. Ngezinto ozifakileyo nge-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, imali yakho elinganiselweyo iya kuba ngu-{{total}} apho {{growth}} kukukhula kwe-interest ephindaphindiweyo.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Ithetha ukuthi: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ijolise ku-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka kwixesha elide, ivuma ukutshintsha kwe-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Iziphumo zokwenene ziyahluka; oku akusithembiso. Yisebenzise ukuva ukuba intlawulo nexesha zitshintsha iziphumo.

compounding.title: Umlingo Wokukhula Kwemali
compounding.description: Funda indlela imali yakho enokukhula ngayo ngokukhawuleza ngexesha ngenxa yamandla enzalo ephindaphindiweyo.

concept.title: Ingcamango
concept.content: Cinga ukuba unomthi wemali. Inzalo ephindaphindiweyo ifana nokutyala imbewu ewela emthini wakho, ukuze zikhule zibe yimithi emitsha yemali.

coreIdea.title: Ingcamango Engundoqo
coreIdea.content: Ufumana inzalo kwimali yakho. Emva koko ufumana *inzalo kwi-nzalo yakho*. Lolo lumlingo.

interactive.title: Yibona Isebenza
interactive.content: Masiyibone isebenza. Tsala isilaydani ukuze ubone indlela utyalo-mali lwe-R10,000 lukhula ngayo ku-8% nzalo.

emergencyFund.title: Ingxowa-mali Yeengxaki Icacisiwe
emergencyFund.description: Kutheni udinga ingxowa-mali yeengxaki nokuba kumalini ekufuneka ugcine ngaphambi kokuba utyale imali.

why.title: Kutheni Uzikhathalele?
why.content: Ubomi buyenzeka‚Äîukuphulukana nomsebenzi, ukulungiswa kweemoto, amayeza. Ingxowa-mali yeengxaki ikuthintela ukuba ungene etyaleni (okanye uthengise utyalo-mali ngexesha elibi).

howMuch.title: Kumalini?
howMuch.content: Umthetho oqhelekileyo: iinyanga ezi-3‚Äì6 zeendleko ezibalulekileyo. Qala ngenjongo encinci (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), emva koko wakhe.

interactive.title: Injongo Yakho
interactive.content: Tsala ukumisela izinto ezibalulekileyo zenyanga (irenti, ukutya, ukuhamba). Siza kukubonisa injongo yeengxaki zeenyanga ezi-3‚Äì6.

firstPortfolio.title: Ukwakha iPothifoliyo Yakho Yokuqala
firstPortfolio.description: Yenza ipothifoliyo yotyalo-mali eyahlukeneyo ehambelana neenjongo zakho nokunyamezela umngcipheko.

goals.title: Qala Ngeenjongo
goals.content: Ixesha + injongo = ukwabiwa. Iinjongo zexesha elifutshane ‚Üí izinto ezikhuselekileyo. Iinjongo zexesha elide ‚Üí izinto zokukhula okuninzi.

diversify.title: Ukwahlula
diversify.content: Dibanisa iindidi zezinto (amasheya, iibhondi, imali esandleni) neendawo ukuze enye engaphumelelanga ingatyibilikisi inqanawa yonke.

interactive.title: Zama Ukwabiwa
interactive.content: Shenxisa ii-slider zamasheya/iibhondi/imali esandleni. Bona ukuguquguquka okulinganisiweyo kunye nembuyekezo yexesha elide iguquka ngexesha lokwenyani.

riskReturn.title: Ukuqonda Umngcipheko Nenzuzo
riskReturn.description: Fumanisa ubudlelwane phakathi komngcipheko namathuba enzuzo ekutyaleni imali.

intro.title: Yintoni Umngcipheko?
intro.content: Umngcipheko kukuba ityala lakho linokunyuka kangakanani okanye liwe. Umngcipheko ophakamileyo unokuthetha inzuzo ephakamileyo ‚Äî kodwa kunye nokudla okukhulu.

tradeoff.title: Utshintshiselwano
tradeoff.content: Izinto ezikhuselekileyo (njengecash) zinenzuzo esezantsi. Izinto ezinomngcipheko (njengezabelo) zinokukhula ngakumbi ekuhambeni kwexesha kodwa zinyikinyeka ngakumbi.

interactive.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho
interactive.content: Shenxisa isilayder phakathi "kokukhuselekileyo" "noomngcipheko" ukubona ukuba ukuguquguquka kunye nenzuzo yexesha elide kunokutshintsha njani.

options.A: Inzuzo ephezulu ihlala ithetha umngcipheko omncinci
options.B: Inzuzo ephezulu enokubakho idla ngokuja nomngcipheko ophezulu

taxEfficient.title: Utyalo-mali Olusebenzayo Ngerhafu
taxEfficient.description: Funda nge-akhawunti ezingenakarhafu / ezinenzuzo yerhafu nokubeka okubulumko ukugcina okuninzi kwezo ngeniso zakho.

wrappers.title: Sebenzisa Isigqubela
wrappers.content: I-akhawunti ezinenzuzo yerhafu ezinje nge-RA, zikhusela ukukhula/izabelo kwiirhafu ezithile.

placement.title: Indawo ye-Asset
placement.content: Beka ii-asset ezingasebenzi kakuhle ngerhafu (umz. iingxowa-mali zebhondi, abahlawuli bezabelo eziphezulu) kwiinkongolo zeerhafu kuqala.

interactive.title: Ukubeka Okubulumko
interactive.content: Rhuqa iingxowa-mali kwi-"Zineerhafu" vs "Zinenzuzo Yerhafu" iibhakiti. Bona uqikelelo emva kwerhafu oluthuthukayo.

quiz.title: Uhlolo Olukhawulezayo
quiz.question: Yeyiphi intshukumo eqhele ukusebenza NGAKUMBI ngerhafu?

options.A: Ukubamba iingxowa-mali zebhondi kwi-akhawunti enenzuzo yerhafu
options.B: Ukubamba iingxowa-mali zebhondi kwi-akhawunti ye-brokerage enerhafu

reward.notEligibleMessage: Gqibezela zonke iimpumelelo ukuqokelela umvuzo wakho!

takeYourTime.title: Thatha ixesha lakho
takeYourTime.description: Musa ukungxama kwizifundo. Thatha ixesha lokuqonda ingqiqo nganye.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Ukuziqhelanisa kwenza umntu agqwese
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Buyela kwizifundo kwaye uzame izinto ezisebenzisanayo izihlandlo ezininzi.

learnDaily.title: Funda Yonke imihla
learnDaily.description: Chitha nje imizuzu eyi-5-10 yonke imihla ukwakha ulwazi lwakho lwezemali.
